body: I can take care of all these... what is the repo to check out? On Sun, Aug 28, 2016 at 4:30 PM, Emmanuel T Odeke wrote: > @madari could also update the other obselete > repo link references? > > After doing a grep in directory /doc articles.html I get back about 17 > lines altogether > > $ grep -Rn 'code.google.com/p/codesearch' * > articles/go_command.html:167:$ go get code.google.com/p/codesearch/index > articles/go_command.html:174 :src/code.google.com/p/codesearch/index/ and > articles/go_command.html:188:code.google.com/p/codesearch/cmd/cgrep > articles/go_command.html:189:code.google.com/p/codesearch/cmd/cindex > articles/go_command.html:190:code.google.com/p/codesearch/cmd/csearch > articles/go_command.html:191:code.google.com/p/codesearch/index > articles/go_command.html:192:code.google.com/p/codesearch/regexp > articles/go_command.html:193:code.google.com/p/codesearch/sparse > articles/go_command.html:203 :? code.google.com/p/codesearch/cmd/cgrep [no test files] > articles/go_command.html:204:? code.google.com/p/codesearch/cmd/cindex [no test files] > articles/go_command.html:205:? code.google.com/p/codesearch/cmd/csearch [no test files] > articles/go_command.html:206:ok code.google.com/p/codesearch/index 0.239s > articles/go_command.html:207:ok code.google.com/p/codesearch/regexp 0.021s > articles/go_command.html:208:? code.google.com/p/codesearch/sparse [no test files] > articles/go_command.html:218:$ cd $GOPATH/src/code.google.com/p/codesearch/regexp > articles/go_command.html:220:code.google.com/p/codesearch/regexp > articles/go_command.html:229:ok code.google.com/p/codesearch/regexp 0.021s > > and all those hits are now under https://github.com/google/codesearch. > > â€” > You are receiving this because you were mentioned. > Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub > , or mute > the thread > > . > -- Mark Harrison marhar@gmail.com
